description: Fratessa Tower honors Paul Fratessa, a beloved department head, and offers some of the most breathtaking views of Poly Canyon! Dedicated to the late ARCE department head, this tower stands on the foundations of a previous structure.
extended_description: While the original tower was decommissioned due to leakage, this successor provides sweeping panoramic views of Poly Canyon. It symbolizes the continuation of architectural tradition and serves as a tribute to Fratessa's lasting impact on the student community. The tower represents the enduring legacy of educators in shaping architectural practice. It continues to inspire students and visitors alike.
